featured.text: Thus “hula” and “hoop” came together, resulting in the term “hula hooping.”
What question does the passage answer? (A) How was the word “hula-hooping” derived? (B)
Though no hoops were used, the movements of the ritual dances looked very similar to those in hooping.

definition.zh_def: 用圓環或圈子進行的運動或遊戲，通常是指用一個圓環在身體周圍轉動。
definition.en_def: The act of moving a hoop around the body, often as a form of exercise or play.
definition.example: She enjoys hooping in the park every afternoon.
